testcase.classname: User could register with valid data
testcase.name: user Register successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to registration page..........................................passed When user enter "Islam" and "Toba" and "islamtoba@gmail.com" and "170389" and "170389".passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed And return to homepage......................................................passed

testcase.classname: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user login successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates login page.............................................passed When user login with "islamtoba@gmail.com" and "170389".....................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed And redirected to homepage..................................................passed

testcase.classname: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user couldn't login successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates login page.............................................passed When user login with "wrong@gmai.com" and "170389"..........................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login successfully......................................passed

testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user could logged by "islamtoba@gmail.com" and "170389"...............passed Given user writes Product name "Apple MacBook"..............................passed Given user click on search button...........................................passed Then the system change the system currency..................................passed

testcase.classname: User could search for any product
testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given user could login by "islamtoba@gmail.com" and "170389"................passed Given user writes Product name "apple"......................................passed When user click on search button............................................passed Then the system show related product that include "Apple"...................passed

testcase.classname: the Logged user could select any different Categories in the system
testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given user could login by "islamtoba@gmail.com" and "170389"................passed When user can hover on computer category and selects sub category notebook..passed Then the system show all sub category products..............................passed

testcase.classname: The links on slider page should working
testcase.name: The links on slider page should working - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User in home page and click on "first"...............................passed Then user verify that "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020" for Slider correct.passed

testcase.classname: The links on slider page should working
testcase.name: The links on slider page should working - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given User in home page and click on "second"..............................passed Then user verify that "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/iphone-6" for Slider correct.passed

testcase.name: the Social media links should be working - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User in home page and click on "Facebook" Icon.......................passed Then user verify that "https://www.facebook.com/nopCommerce" for every social correct.passed

testcase.name: the Social media links should be working - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given User in home page and click on "Twitter" Icon........................passed Then user verify that "https://twitter.com/nopCommerce" for every social correct.passed

testcase.classname: the User can follow us on different Social media
testcase.name: the Social media links should be working - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given User in home page and click on "Youtube" Icon........................passed Then user verify that "https://www.youtube.com/user/nopCommerce" for every social correct.passed

testcase.classname: the User can follow us on different Social media
testcase.name: the Social media links should be working - Example #1.4
testcase.system-out: Given User in home page and click on "RSS" Icon............................passed Then user verify that "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/news/rss/1" for every social correct.passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given User in homepage and add product to his wishlist......................passed And the system show green success message...................................passed When user go to his Wishlist................................................passed Then The User find Product "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop" in the Wishlist.passed
